item.title: The GAC Manager
item.description: I have started a new project on CodePlex called 'GAC Manager'. This is a project that is in two parts, the first is a simple tool to allow users to manipulate their local global assembly cache, the second is an API that provides the core functionality. Here's a screenshot of the tool in its current state: An article on the project is available on the CodeProject at: http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/430568/A-GAC-Manager-Utility-and-API The project itself is at: https://gacmanager.
